title: ADORE: Autonomous Domain-Oriented Relevance Engine for E-commerce
summary: Relevance modeling in e-commerce search remains challenged by semantic gaps in term-matching methods (e.g., BM25) and neural models' reliance on the scarcity of domain-specific hard samples.
